New Records: India recorded the highest score of the tournament with 357/8
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 5/18, his best ODI figures
Ravindra Jadeja run out Dilshan Madushanka for 35
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elected to field first after winning the toss
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami was awarded the player of the match for his 5/18
India took a crucial win to stay in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's 357/8 is the highest score of the tournament
Sri Lanka's 55 all out is the lowest total of the tournament
